# SEQ05 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 5 focuses on community networks

## Category
Towns

## Patterns
apl016, apl017, apl018, apl019, apl020

## Emergent Phenomena
Connected networks that allow easy movement and communication while maintaining local character

## Overview
This sequence contains 5 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
